enumMember.name: NOT_AVAILABLE
enumMember.description: The value is used if information is currently not available.

enumMember.name: TRANSMISSION
enumMember.description: TRANSMISSION is RAT-type used to identify MINI-LINK equipment.

enumMember.name: FALSE
enumMember.description: This node does not control the support system.

enumMember.name: TRUE
enumMember.description: This node controls the support system.

enumMember.name: NOT_AVAILABLE
enumMember.description: The value is used if information is currently not available.

class.name: ExternalNode
class.description:
MO ExternalNode represents an external node sharing certain resources (such as climate, power and external alarm hardware) with this node and possibly other external nodes. A node here is understood as node with ManagedElement as top MO.
If attribute supportSystemControl on MO EquipmentSupportFunction is true: - Number of MOs ExternalNode must match number of external nodes. - MO is used to configure related resources. - Attribute informationOnly is false. - Child MO EcPort is used to configure communication between nodes.
If attribute supportSystemControl on MO EquipmentSupportFunction is false: - MO ExternalNode is optional. - MO used only for information. - Attribute informationOnly is true. - Child MO EcPort is optional, but has no function.
Dependencies: Mandatory child MO EcPort when the attribute informationOnly is set to false.

attribute.name: externalNodeId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: radioAccessTechnology
attribute.description: Radio access technology that external node can support. NOT_AVAILABLE used if no information is available from the external node. When external node can run more than one standard, set to MULTI_STANDARD.

attribute.name: supportSystemControl
attribute.description: Support system control on MO EquipmentSupportFunction in external node. NOT_AVAILABLE is used when no information is available from the external node.

attribute.name: logicalName
attribute.description: Logical name on MO ManagedElement in external node. Undefined value, an empty string, is used for node that has no configured logicalName. NOT AVAILABLE is used when no information is available from external node. NOT_AVAILABLE is also used for MULTI_STANDARD node which doesn't have a logical name on MO ManagedElement.

attribute.name: informationOnly
attribute.description:
Indicates if the MO data is only for informational purposes or for configuration purposes.
When set to true, the MO contains read-only data about the external nodes. The number of MO ExternalNode does not have to match the actual number of external nodes. The MO attributes are populated with data if a corresponding external node exists.
When set to false, the MO contains configuration data such as MO EcPort. The MO ExternalNode number must match the actual number of external nodes.
attribute.dependencies: The attribute value must be false if attribute supportsystemControl on referred MO EquipmentSupportFunction has the value true and vice versa.

attribute.name: fullDistinguishedName
attribute.description: Full Distinguished Name (FDN) on MO ManagedElement in external node. Undefined value, an empty string, is used for node that has no configured fullDistinguishedName, such as a GSM node. NOT AVAILABLE is used when no information is available from external node. For MULTI_STANDARD node the FDN is derived from attributes dnPrefix and managedElementId.

attribute.name: equipmentSupportFunctionRef
attribute.description: Reference to the EquipmentSupportFunction MO where the MO ExternalNode belongs.
